          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_a69a87b703b34da29c803472037a736af7fb7dd9</entry>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Springs inside a tray holder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühlinge innerhalb eines Tellersegmenthalters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressorts à l'intérieur d'un support de plateau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Molas dentro de um suporte da bandeja</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molle all'interno di un supporto del cassetto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελατήρια μέσα σε έναν κάτοχο δίσκων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resortes dentro de un sostenedor de la bandeja</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a tray holder. The top tray is always level with the top of the holder because of the springs inside.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stretching</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tray holder</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Tellersegmenthalter. 
Das obere Tellersegment ist immer gleich mit der Oberseite des 
Halters wegen der Frühlinge nach innen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un support de plateau. 
Le magasin supérieur est toujours de niveau avec le dessus du 
support en raison des ressorts à l'intérieur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um suporte da bandeja. 
A bandeja superior é sempre ao nível com o alto do suporte por
causa das molas para dentro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un supporto del 
cassetto. Il cassetto superiore è sempre a livello con la parte
superiore del supporto a causa delle molle all'interno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κάτοχο δίσκων. Ο 
κορυφαίος δίσκος είναι πάντα επίπεδο με την κορυφή του κατόχου 
λόγω των ελατηρίων μέσα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un sostenedor de la 
bandeja. La bandeja superior está siempre llano con la tapa del
sostenedor debido a los resortes adentro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tellersegment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tellersegmenthalter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">étirage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plateau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">support de plateau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bandeja</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">suporte da bandeja</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cassetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">supporto del cassetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
